message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.RO 

The paper proposes a new method for computing optical flow, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely category. The method also involves optimization and energy functionals, which are common topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.AI a likely category as well. The paper also discusses the robustness of the method, which is a common concern in machine learning and optimization, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible category. The method involves structured coordinate-descent, which is a common optimization technique in graphics and robotics, making cs.GR (Computer Graphics) and cs.RO (Robotics) possible categories as well.
